title: Winter Stews
desc:
Please click  here  for more information. 
 On the menu: Bulgogi jeongol ??? ??- Thinly sliced beef stew * Soy, shitake and pear-based broth * Handmade buckwheat noodles 
 Dalk bokeum tang ???? - Spicy chicken stew * Gochujang (Korean red pepper paste)-based broth * Sweet potato glass noodles * Kimchi stir-fried rice 
 
 ** No refunds are offered on Banchan Story's classes. Students must cancel at least 72 hours before the scheduled class to receive the full value of their purchase in class credit to be used towards another class. Cancellations within 72hours are not eligible for class credit. However, we are always happy to welcome someone in your place. Class spots are fully transferrable.
